title: Draft RoundCube KEV Client Advisory

description: Preliminary application strategy for CGA. $3.5M pool, June 23 deadline. Map eligibility and prepare narrative.

title: Research NHI Management Solutions for MSSP Stack
description: Survey non-human identity management tools that could be added to Capital Cyber's service offerings. 82:1 ratio is a market gap.

description: Sales collateral directly addressing Reuters-cited pain points. Compare Capital Cyber support vs. months-long audit waits.

description: Cover AI-assisted FortiGate breach (600+ devices) and supply chain attacks (NuGet, Codespaces).
